original_text: Blessed are those who wash their robes, so that they may have the right to the tree of life and that they may enter the city by the gates.
korean_text: 자기 두루마기를 빠는 자들은 복이 있으니 이는 그들이 생명나무에 나아가며 문들을 통하여 성에 들어갈 권세를 받으려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: Blessed are those who wash their robes
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 옷을 씻는 자들은 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: so that they may have the right
and that they may enter the city
